segments.text: So your mom can stop nagging you now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Trust me . She'll keep nagging . She thinks something will go wrong .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't tell me she's been listening to the fortune-teller again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You guessed it . She says we have to get married on January 2nd , or we'll have bad luck .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The day we choose to get married could never be an unlucky day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My mom just wants everything to be perfect for us .
segments.speaker: S2
